items.sentence: Tom said he used to go to Boston three times a month.
Tom said he thought Mary was good at speaking French.
Tom said Mary was likely to be in Boston next Monday.
Tom doesn't think Mary will be in Boston next winter.
Tom said he was planning to go to Boston next summer.
I wonder if Tom really wants to go to Boston with us.
Tom said he didn't have enough money to go to Boston.
Tom said that he didn't want the money I offered him.
Uninstall that app. It's nothing but a waste of time.
It's rare for me to connect so well with a therapist.
